channel.title: Ted Cruz on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Ted Cruz on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Ted Cruz Opposes FCC Threats Over Kimmel Remark: ‘That Will End up Bad for Conservatives’
item.description: Sen. Ted Cruz warned Friday that conservatives would come to regret using state power to silence Jimmy Kimmel, saying that such power will be turned against them in a future Democratic administration.

item.title: Ted Cruz Opposes FCC Threats Over Kimmel Remark: ‘That Will End up Bad for Conservatives’
item.description: Sen. Ted Cruz warned Friday that conservatives would come to regret using state power to silence Jimmy Kimmel, saying that such power will be turned against them in a future Democratic administration.

item.title: Ted Cruz AI bill could let firms bribe Trump to avoid safety laws, critics warn
item.description: Ted Cruz won’t give up fight to block states from regulating AI.

item.title: Rocket Report: Neutron’s pad opens for business; SpaceX gets Falcon 9 green light
item.description: “Nobody’s waving the white flag here until the last hour of the last day.”

item.title: FCC chair teams up with Ted Cruz to block Wi-Fi hotspots for schoolkids
item.description: Ted Cruz’s anti-hotspot bill stalled, but FCC is ending Wi-Fi program on its own.

item.title: Ted Cruz reminds us why NASA’s rocket is called the “Senate Launch System”
item.description: “We need better than just window dressing.”

item.title: Houston, you’ve got a space shuttle… only NASA won’t say which one
item.description: “The acting administrator has made an identification.”

item.title: “It’s a heist”: Senator calls out Texas for trying to steal shuttle from Smithsonian
item.description: “The title of this amendment is ‘Houston, We Have a Problem.’”
